author: Simon Difford
description: Reminiscent of a Hemingway Special, this flavoursome, vanilla-laced Daiquiri has a wonderfully tangy, bittersweet finish.
name: Lisa's Special Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 75 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum (infused with vanilla)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
